Package datastorage.catalog

The implementation of the system catalog.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Catalog The implementation of the system catalog.
CatalogJoinBookkeepingInfo Bookkeeping info for the joins of the execution plan.
CatalogStream It contains all the stored information for a stream.
 

Package datastorage.catalog Description

The implementation of the system catalog.

It consists of three components: 

The Catalog class
The implementation of the system catalog. It consists of a CatalogJoinBookkeepingInfo Object, and a CatalogStream Object 
The CatalogJoinBookkeepingInfo class
It performs bookkeeping of the information for the joins that exist in the execution plan. 
The CatalogStream class
It contains all the stored to the catalog information for a stream. The name of the stream, the types and the values of the attributes, and the SteMs and predicates where each tuple of this stream should be routed to.
